result.arabic_text: بَلَىٰۚ مَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِعَهۡدِهِۦ وَٱتَّقَىٰ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ
result.translation: 76.Yeeylwonna hinnay dambi Siinil yanih, kinnih immay Yallaa kee kay farmoytit Nummayseeh Amaanat yacayu waamah Yallah hee xagana duudusaah meqe taama Abaah umaanek yaxxeereemil Yallak meesite niara, toysa Diggah Yalli uma taamak yexxeereeh isik meesita mara kicnih.
